text: Barvinok (Ukrainian: Барвінок, Hungarian: Börvinges) is a village in the Uzhhorodskyi Raion in the Zakarpattia Oblast in western Ukraine. It is located 6 km southeast of Uzhhorod. == History == Barvinok and its surroundings were inhabited even in prehistoric times. Flaked stone tools were discovered nearby. The settlement itself was a farmstead established in the 19th century. Its first written mention dates back to 1863 under the name Bervingos. It was a suburban settlement of Baranyntsi, and until 2020 it belonged to it administratively. Category:Settlements of Uzhhorod District Category:Villages in Ukraine
title: Barvinok (Ukraine)
